definitions.definition: The scientific and cultural community engaged in higher education and research, taken as a whole.
examples: Academia continues to provide scientific education, despite attempts to turn it into a system of professional schooling.

definitions.definition: Continuous study at higher education institutions ; scholarship .
examples: Not every university graduate wishes to pursue academia .

main_definition: ( collective ) The scientific and cultural community engaged in higher education and research, taken as a whole. [from 1956]
secondary_definitions: Continuous study at higher education institutions ; scholarship .
